topicTitle: Attacked and graped in the mouth

posts.postText:
[Greet] Hello, all.
[Introduction] I think its time you meet your local grapist.
[Lie] I am safe to be around.
[Quote] "Have you ever noticed that anybody driving slower than you is an idiot, and anyone going faster than you is a maniac?" - George Carlin
[Interest] Garry's mod
[Goal] To replace melons with grapes, and banana's too.
[Conclusion] I told you a little about myself.
[Tie end] Thank you. A grapist near you.
I've seen you on the jail server from time to time.  Welcome!
